alert.note: Alert for Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 21 at 11:19AM AKDT until March 23 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The South Klondike Highway above 1000 feet. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Visibility will be very poor at times with blowing snow developing Tuesday and Tuesday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Skagway will receive periods of snow and rain through Tuesday morning before changing to rain the rest of Tuesday and Tuesday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
